name: Hammerhead 7.5-Amp 1/2 Inch Variable Speed Hammer Drill with 6pcs Bit - HAHD075
short_description: Powerful 7. 5-Amp Motor – Corded hammer drill tackle the most demanding projects
Keyless 1/2 Inch Metal Chuck – Powerful hammer drill Provides great convenience for frequent bit changes. Please note that this hammer drill can NOT be used in reinforced concrete walls.
2-in-1 Multi-Function - Easy switch , select the right function for each application in an instant
Variable Speed Trigger - With preset selector and lock on, increased control and continuous operations, choose the speed you need as materials and conditions change
Soft Grip Handle – Maximum comfort with relentless drill hammer in the palm of your hand
product_description: The Hammerhead 1/2 Inch Hammer Drill is equipped with a powerful 7. 5-Amp motor and variable speed trigger with trigger lock-on for prolonged operation. The two-mode selector switch easily changes the action from rotation-only to hammer-drill function. This Hammer Drill reaches 0-3, 000 RPM and hammers out 0-48, 000 IPM. To relieve arm strain and muscle fatigue, the adjustable side handle can be moved to get better leverage for specific jobs. More About This Product: ●7. 5A powerful motor; ●0-3, 000 RPM and 0-48, 000 IPM; ●1/2 inch Half Metal Keyless Chuck; ●Forward and reverse rotation switch; ●Side handle with depth gauge.
product_details: Included Components ‎Hammer Drill, 3pcs Drill Bit for Steel, 3pcs Drill Bit for Concrete, 1pc Depth Gauge, 1pc Auxiliary Handle

name: BLACK+DECKER Hammer Drill, 6.5-Amp, 1/2-Inch (BEHD201)
short_description: POWERFUL 6.5 AMP MOTOR – Delivers 48,000 bpm to quickly drill through hard materials like concrete, stone, and brick.
2-POSITION SWITCH – Select standard drill or hammer drill function.
3-POSITION SIDE HANDLE – Keeps you comfortable and helps reduce muscle fatigue across a range of applications.
1/2 IN. SINGLE-SLEEVE CHUCK – Allows for easy bit changes and accommodates larger bits.
CORDED – Corded drill offers unlimited runtime for even the biggest jobs.
INCLUDES – (1) BEHD201 electric hammer drill.
product_description: When a standard drill just isn’t powerful enough, BLACK+DECKER’s 6.5 Amp, 1/2 in. electric hammer drill is the obvious choice. Its 6.5 Amp motor operates at 48,000 bpm to drill quickly and effectively through different types of masonry and other materials. And thanks to a 2-position switch that lets you toggle between standard- and hammer-drill functions with the click of a button, you can still use this electric hammer drill like a traditional one for materials like wood. The corded design ensures you’ll never run out of power, while the 3-position side handle helps provide a comfortable grip from start to finish. The single-sleeve keyless chuck accommodates bits up to 1/2 in. and lets you swap them out quickly and easily.
product_details: Included Components ‎(1) 6.5 Amp 1/2-Inch Hammer Drill, (1) Side-Handle
